text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump we know the % of people diagnosed with #COVID19 dying is less than 2.5% because we know there’s a lot of more that had mild or no symptoms never counted, than why are we hiding? Yeah it’s more contagious but flu 1% COVID could be same if we had true number https://t.co/dzkTsfUJ5s https://t.co/qlSwuMaB3m
